headline.print_headline: Conservative States Balk at Gay Marriage Action
headline.main: Conservative States Balk at Gay Marriage Action

lead_paragraph: Conservative officials in some of the six states where Supreme Court action this week likely cleared the way for same-sex weddings say they won't issue marriage licenses to gay couples until their hands are forced. Now, gay rights advocates are preparing to do just that.
